title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover! This durable and spacious kennel is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Made from galvanized metal iron with a paint-coated finish, this kennel is rust-resistant and has no sharp edges, ensuring your furry friends stay safe and secure.

The 210D oxford cloth cover provides protection from the elements, making it windproof, weatherproof, and even providing shade from the sun. The solid latching swing gate and strong latches offer added security for your pets.

Available in both small and large sizes, this kennel is not just for dogs - it's also suitable for chickens, rabbits, and ducks. Easy to assemble panels make installation a breeze.

Give your pets the space and security they deserve with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover. Order yours today!
